tool_description: Use the Toku Post-Paid SMS API to send SMS and manage OTP requests programmatically.
name: Post-Paid SMS
title: Post-Paid SMS

api_list.name: Send SMS
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://post-paid-sms.p.rapidapi.com/SMS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "post-paid-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://post-paid-sms.p.rapidapi.com/SMS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "post-paid-sms.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
